briefTitle: A Trial to Evaluate the Safety of Long Term Treatment With Nintedanib in Patients With Scleroderma Related Lung Fibrosis
officialTitle: An Open-label Extension Trial of the Long Term Safety of Nintedanib in Patients With 'Systemic Sclerosis Associated Interstitial Lung Disease' (SSc-ILD)
summary: The main objective is to assess long term safety of treatment with oral nintedanib in patients with Systemic Sclerosis associated Interstitial Lung Disease (SSc-ILD).

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients With Any Adverse Event (AE) Over the Course of the Trial
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: First trial medication intake up to last trial drug intake, plus 7 days residual effect period, up to approximate 60 months.
